name: 三極姬 4 天華繚亂 天命的戀繪卷( Sanoku Hime 4~Tenka Ryouran Tenmei no Koi Emaki
name_original: 三極姬 4 天華繚亂 天命的戀繪卷( Sanoku Hime 4~Tenka Ryouran Tenmei no Koi Emaki
description:
Sanoku Hime 4~Tenka Ryouran Tenmei no Koi Emaki is a SLG combine with ADV game made by SystemSoft Alplha. Sanoku Hime 4 set the story back to the era of The Three Kingdoms.Sanoku Hime 4 Changed all of the heroes' appearances into beautiful female warriors. In this fantasy Three Kingdom troubled times, players will experience the new story developed from the “Romance of the Three Kingdoms”. On one hand, players can map out the best strategies to fight for power. On the other hand, players can also start a love relationship with beautiful female warriors. You will choose your future, guide your country, and fall in love.

The game has two main parts:
Soldiers and warriors recruitment, expanding power as a goal are SLG part of the game。
The conversation with characters, the process of taking over the world as a goal with beautiful girls are the second parts.

How the game proceeds:
You will first experience reading and conversation with characters. You will get inside the story, develop relationships.
When it comes to action, the game will be divided into 4 seasons, one season as one round. Each round contains 5 phases: Update, Army preparation, Strategy, Operation, Battle.

Each phase you will manage your territory, and prepare for battle.
Update phase：This is an important phase. You can see main events happening, such as natural disasters and income displays or volunteers. You can gain the CP you need to move the troops.

Army Preparation phase : This is the phase that you choose a warlord and soldiers. You can hire new warlords or move yours from one castle to another. Manage your CP and command your troops.

Strategy phase : It’s the phase that you strengthen your national power. Your income increases when you enhance your country. You can recruit more soldiers, build stronger walls around your castle. Enjoy the fun of building structures. And having interesting conversation with your military commanders

Operation phase : It’s a phase where you choose to go in or out, cutting off enemies power. In this phase you will know every status. Making sure you make wise decision.

Battle phase : This is where you order to strike and engage in battle. Find out the best warlord combo to win.

In Sanoku Hime 4~Tenka Ryouran Tenmei no Koi Emaki. The new character “Xiaoren '' was released. Even though his character is ordinary, but with unbelievable power, he will write a new Sangokuhime with 61 other characters.

Background story
The story begins at the era of The Three Kingdoms：chaos spreaded all over China. At the moment of the sound of the wind and the cry of the stork, parts of the warrior shout loudly about putting down the world. The main character is a teenager who seeks the meaning of his own existence in chaotic China. Only having incredible power, kind heart. showed deep desire for his power. What kind of future will his existence bring to this chaotic world eventually? This will rely on the player's discovery.
